'''19w46b''' is the fifteenth and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.15]], released on November 14, 2019.<ref name="19w46b">{{snap|19w46b|November 14, 2019}}</ref> It fixes bugs, and tweaks minor settings. This is the final snapshot released in 2019.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Narrator]]'''
* [[Command]] suggestions are now narrated if the narrator is turned to system or all.

'''Text'''
* Tweaked contrast for text colors.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=19w46b|otherissuescount=3
|;old
|38779|Thin black stripes over mooshrooms / iron golems / enderman / falling block with mipmapping.
|86619|Hand moves up and down when switching between empty slots.
|112995|Cannot use items while looking at armor stand.
|114576|Blocks with flat textures held by player in third person view, villager / iron golem or enderman have z-fighting.
|119078|Glowing is not working for some entities.
|;dev
|161874|Scoreboard sidebar text is partially transparent.
|163404|Inner parts of slime blocks and honey blocks disappear while the block is moved by a piston.
|165521|Thrown items are rotated incorrectly when using the third person camera from the front.
}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed a crash when bees forgot about a flower position.
* Fixed a crash when an invalid biome was specified for a superflat world.
* Fixed a crash when tab completing names in the chat.</onlyinclude>
